name: LO!
description:
Lo is a prehistoric survival game. Make your strategy, spend your resources wisely and keep Neanderthals alive!

How to play:

  • Game is played with mouse only.
  • Your people has 2 kind of needs. Food and Raw materials.
  • Click on the resources to spread resources for your people.
  • You gain LO points as your people reproduce, buy new resource with your LO point. Buy buttons are below.
  • Your people may go rage if they are out of resources and attack each other or just die from hunger. Keep them alive and good luck!
